platform itself consists of three components we have the at the base we
have the melio volume manager that is a cluster aware volume manager that has been specifically designed for shared
storage environments we also have the melio file system this is a 64-bit clustered file
system that's designed to allow multiple servers to concurrently read and write
to the file system and then the last component sitting on top of the stack is a cluster and that's the component that

agnostic it also allows you to aggregate internal storage as well as external

fifty sixty with hot spare support and auto rebuild it also supports
synchronous and throttled replication a storage live migration so you can

it also supports dynamic volume expansion and the ability to change the configuration without disrupting those

sits on top of the volume manager that's providing you the actual shared file
system access so it's a 64 bit symmetrical file system so being

system this is also the component that contains the quality of service

cluster so the actual app application clustering component are designed
